string-array.name: control_info_desc
string-array.item: To manually control the equipment turn AI off. Turn AI on for AI predictions and automatic controls
Provides illumination essential for photosynthesis in plants and visibility in indoor environments.
Circulates water through a system, such as in hydroponics or aquariums.
Dispenses precise amounts of pH-adjusting solutions to regulate and maintain the pH level of a fluid.
Dispenses specific amounts of nutrient solutions to control the electrical conductivity and nutrient levels of a solution in applications like hydroponics.
Removes stale air or unwanted odors from an enclosed space
Generates airflow for ventilation or cooling purposes in various applications
AI can be turned off for manual control over the equipment.
Current temperature will determine if the light is on/off. Temperature OK/HIGH wil turn light off. Temperature LOW will turn light on.
Current humidity will determine if the extractor fan is on/off. Humidity LOW/OK will turn light off. Humidity HIGH wil turn extractor fan on.
Current ph will determine if the ph pumps are increasing pH or decreasing pH. pH LOW will increase pH. pH HIGH will decrease pH. ph OK will turn pumps off.
Current EC will determine if the EC pumps are increasing EC or decreasing EC. EC LOW will increase EC. EC HIGH will decrease EC. EC OK will turn pumps off.

string-array.name: sensor_info_desc
string-array.item: Measurement of how acidic or basic the water is.
Concentration of nutrients in the water.
Affects plant growth, nutrient absorption, and system stability.
Amount of moisture in the air in a hydroponic system

string-array.name: control_prediction_info_desc
string-array.item: AI can be turned off for manual control over the equipment.
Current temperature will determine if the light is on/off. Temperature OK/HIGH wil turn light off. Temperature LOW will turn light on.
Current humidity will determine if the extractor fan is on/off. Humidity LOW/OK will turn light off. Humidity HIGH wil turn extractor fan on.
Current ph will determine if the ph pumps are increasing pH or decreasing pH. pH LOW will increase pH. pH HIGH will decrease pH. ph OK will turn pumps off.
Current EC will determine if the EC pumps are increasing EC or decreasing EC. EC LOW will increase EC. EC HIGH will decrease EC. EC OK will turn pumps off.

resources.string:
Dear valued user,


We highly appreciate your feedback! To help us better understand your concerns and improve our services, we kindly request that you be as informative as possible in your feedback message. Please provide specific details, examples, and any relevant context you think would be helpful. 

 Your input is invaluable to us and plays a crucial role in making our app even better. Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts! 

 Warm regards,
 The SmartHydro Team
Two options for resetting system:\n1: Soft reset\n2: Hard reset
Step 1: Open system box in tent
Step 2: Locate small red button on Arduino
Step 3: Hold in until system turns off and on again
Step 1: Locate 2 plugs on the side of system box
Step 3: Turn switch off and on again
Step 1: Head to the control page through the navigation bar
Step 2: Switch AI off. This will make the equipment controls appear
Step 1: Open Wi-Fi settings on device
Step 2: Search for SmartHydro (If the network does not appear ensure that you are within range of smart hydro and that the system is on)
Step 3: Connect to SmartHydro with the password: SmartHydro123!
